outline:
1. to sweep or snatch away, catch up, destroy, consume
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be snatched away
      2. to sweep or snatch away
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be swept away, be destroyed
      2. to be caught up, be captured
    3. (Hiphil) to catch up, gather
kjv_def: add, augment, consume, destroy, heap, join, perish, put.
strongs_def: properly, to scrape (literally, to shave; but usually figuratively) together (i.e. to accumulate or increase) or away (i.e. to scatter, remove, or ruin; intransitively, to perish)
